text: Mu by’ukuri, mu iremwa ry’ibirere n’isi, kubisikana kw’ijoro n’amanywa, amato agenda mu nyanja mu bifitiye abantu akamaro, amazi Allah amanura mu kirere (imvura) nuko akayahesha isi ubuzima nyuma yo gupfa (gukakara) kwayo, akanayikwizamo inyamaswa z’amoko yose, n’ihindagurika ry’imiyaga n’ibicu bigenzwa hagati y’ikirere n’isi; rwose ibyo ni ibimenyetso (bigaragaza ubumwe bw’Imana, ubushobozi n’ingabire byayo) ku bantu bafite ubwenge
